data.actual_result: It scrolls back up to the unread message!
data.expected_result: You should stay at the bottom of the channel so you can read any new messages
data.short_description: [Overlay] Scrolling down in a channel that is still "Unread" will scroll it back up to the unread point and not where you left it. (Ask for video)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Overlay - Find a channel with "Unread" messages in it (more messages makes it easier to see) - Scroll down to the bottom of the chat (Pin the chat if you haven't already) - Close overlay
